text: John Richard "Dickie" Moore, Jr. (September 12, 1925 - September 10, 2015) was a former American child actor. He was known for his roles in Oliver Twist, Blonde Venus, and in Miss Annie Rooney. Moore was born on September 12, 1925 in Los Angeles, California. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Photographs and literature * "Fun with Dick and Jane" article w/photos Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:American silent movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Dickie Moore (actor)
